metadata.title: CVE-2021-23956 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An ambiguous file picker design could have confused users who intended to select and upload a single file into uploading a whole directory. This was addressed by adding a new prompt. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 85.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '85.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
